code: const apiBaseUrl=process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?'https://stianjp.github.io/chatbot':'http://localhost:5001';export const askChatbot=async function(conversationMessages){let systemPrompt=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"";try{const response=await fetch("".concat(apiBaseUrl,"/api/chat"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({conversationMessages,systemPrompt})});const textResponse=await response.text();console.log("üîç Server response:",textResponse);const data=JSON.parse(textResponse);return data.response;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Feil ved API-kall:",error);return"Beklager, det oppstod en feil.";}};
